S1.name: Spirit:
S1.text: I can see the moon reflecting in the water! It’s like a mirror, it's beautiful!

S2.name: Spirit:
S2.text: They say any wish made in the fountain our great king will grant!

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: The king granted my wish!! I’m off to the academy!

M1.name: Spirit:
M1.text: I can see the sun reflecting in the water! It’s like a mirror, it's beautiful!

M2.name: Spirit:
M2.text: This isn’t what I wished for…

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: Even the fountain has started to run dry…
